title: The Soul Keeper
description: The audio book is now available on Amazon, Audible and iTunes. Thanks for giving it a listen! Travel to 1967, where young people flock by the thousands to San Francisco seeking freedom, friendship and transcendence. What Willow doesn't realize after experimenting with mind altering drugs is that her perception may have changed for good. Will she discover what the stranger wants before it's too late? 18+ recommendation due to mature content concerning references to drug use and its culture.
author: Bibiana Krall
